cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.AI, cs.DB. 

The paper discusses the importance of precise and explicit business specifications, which are essential for software development. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Software Engineering (cs.SE) category. Additionally, the paper emphasizes the use of object-oriented (OO) specifications, which suggests that it may also belong to the Programming Languages (cs.PL) category. The paper also discusses the use of patterns, which are commonly used in the Logic in Computer Science (cs.LO) category. The paper may also belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) category, as it discusses the use of specifications to support the elicitation and validation of business requirements. Finally, the paper may belong to the Databases (cs.DB) category, as it discusses the reuse of concepts and constructs across different businesses.
